languages.text: Источник необъяснимых и опасных феноменов на нижней палубе — Идира Тласс, утратившая контроль над своими способностями. Неблагоприятное развитие ситуации было предупреждено, устранение последствий препоручено жителям отсека.

traits.locale_text: Источник необъяснимых и опасных феноменов на нижней палубе — Идира Тласс, утратившая контроль над своими способностями. Неблагоприятное развитие ситуации было предупреждено, устранение последствий препоручено жителям отсека.

languages.text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.
languages.original_text: Источник необъяснимых и опасных феноменов на нижней палубе — Идира Тласс, утратившая контроль над своими способностями. Неблагоприятное развитие ситуации было предупреждено, устранение последствий препоручено жителям отсека.

traits.locale_text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

languages.text: 是伊迪拉·特拉斯引发了下层甲板无法解释的危险现象，她的能力失控了。领主舰长赶在情况进一步恶化之前解决了问题，后续的善后工作则交给了那片甲板的船员。
languages.original_text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: 是伊迪拉·特拉斯引发了下层甲板无法解释的危险现象，她的能力失控了。领主舰长赶在情况进一步恶化之前解决了问题，后续的善后工作则交给了那片甲板的船员。

languages.text: 下層デッキで起きた説明しようのない危険な現象の原因は、能力の制御を失ったイディラ・トラスだった。状況がさらに悪化する前に対処し、その後の処理はベイの住民に委ねられた。
languages.original_text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: 下層デッキで起きた説明しようのない危険な現象の原因は、能力の制御を失ったイディラ・トラスだった。状況がさらに悪化する前に対処し、その後の処理はベイの住民に委ねられた。

languages.text: La fuente de los fenómenos peligrosos e inexplicables de las cubiertas inferiores era Idira Tlass, que había perdido el control de sus habilidades. La situación se ha resuelto antes de que empeorara y se ha dejado en manos de los habitantes de la bahía el ocuparse de las secuelas.
languages.original_text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: La fuente de los fenómenos peligrosos e inexplicables de las cubiertas inferiores era Idira Tlass, que había perdido el control de sus habilidades. La situación se ha resuelto antes de que empeorara y se ha dejado en manos de los habitantes de la bahía el ocuparse de las secuelas.

languages.text: Die Ursache der unbeschreiblichen und gefährlichen Phänomene auf dem unteren Deck war Idira Tlass, der die Kontrolle über ihre Fähigkeiten entglitten war. Die Situation konnte vor einer weiteren Eskalation bereinigt werden. Die Beseitigung der Nachwirkungen wurde den Bewohnern der Bucht überlassen.
languages.original_text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Die Ursache der unbeschreiblichen und gefährlichen Pphänomene auf dem unteren Deck war Idira Tlass, der die Kontrolle über ihre Fähigkeiten entglitten war. Die Situation konnte vor einer weiteren Eskalation bereinigt werden. Die Beseitigung der Nachwirkungen wurde den Bewohnern der Bucht überlassen.

languages.text: La source de ce phénomène dangereux et inexplicable dans les ponts inférieurs n'était autre qu'Idira, qui avait perdu le contrôle de ses capacités. La situation a été résolue avant qu'elle ne s'aggrave davantage, et on laissa aux habitants de la baie le soin d'en faire disparaître les traces.
languages.original_text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: La source de ce phénomène dangereux et inexplicable dans les ponts inférieurs n'était autre qu'Idira, qui avait perdu le contrôle de ses capacités. La situation a été résolue avant qu'elle ne s'aggrave davantage, et on laissa aux habitants de la baie le soin d'en faire disparaître les traces.

languages.text: Alt güvertedeki anlaşılmaz ve tehlikeli fenomenin kaynağının, kabiliyetlerinin kontrolünü kaybeden İdira Tlass olduğu ortaya çıktı. Mesele daha fazla büyümeden çözüme ulaştırıldı ve ortalığın temizliği, bölme sakinlerine bırakıldı.
languages.original_text: The source of the inexplicable and perilous phenomena on the lower deck was Idira Tlass, who had lost control over her abilities. The situation was addressed before it could deteriorate further, and disposing of the aftermath was entrusted to the bay's inhabitants.
